website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality yet lightweight option that installs very securely.
pros: Lightweight enough to be portable, but also has a very secure, four-corner installation system
Erases well with no lingering residue
cons: The marker/eraser tray is small and a little on the cheap side
Some buyers have had issues with this option arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice magnetic whiteboard for the price. I was impressed with how they package it for shipping... very well protected and it arrived without issue. I also like the easy mounting using the screw holes in the four corners versus other boards that have mounting tabs or hardware (much easier this way in my opinion). The only thing I don't particularly like is the unfinished edges (the channel between the two aluminum frame pieces is open. I saw this in the product photos before I ordered, so I was aware and I admit I will rarely look at it from the sides. Other than my personal minor cosmetic point, these are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: BradB

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Item was damaged when received. One entire side was bent out of shape. One of the corners was torn. I took a lot of time to review similar products on Amazon before deciding to choose this one. Most of the other products had similar issues in terms of being damaged when the product was received. This particular product did not seem to have those kind of issues and hence I ended up ordering this board. Maybe there are some fake reviews for this one that give it a higher rating than it should have..
customer_reviews.author: Fjords

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great dry erase board! I purchased the 36"x48". It was a lot more sturdy than I was expecting. Instead of being surrounded by plastic like cheaper boards, it's surrounded by a thick aluminum. Looks great up on the office wall! It did arrive with 2 bends in the aluminum at the bottom. (last 2 pictures) Not that noticable. Overall, very happy!👍
customer_reviews.author: Writer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice product...poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one & it was received damaged. Returned it. Repeated two more times. All received damaged. The packaging is inadequate to prevent damage (at least in the way the product is handled by UPS). I kept the only one that did not have damage on the writing surface; the frame surrounding the board was a bit crushed since I needed one for use in our church. Would not recommend this product; 3 out of 3 received damaged. The product itself is fine...if received without damage, which in my experience, seems unlikely.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: It definitely feels a lot better than my old one and a lot more sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a week and I'm extremely impressed with the board. It definitely feels a lot better than my old one and a lot more sturdy and more slick. The marker tray feels a little on the cheap side but the rest is excellent. Writing comes off very easily (I use a small microfiber towel as it works best). The box it came with was a little banged up but the board itself was not damaged. I definitely recommend this board.
customer_reviews.author: buyer24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality for daily heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture. The board erases easy without leaving marker residue (we use a dry-erase eraser). I haven't need to use a cleaner on it, yet, and we've had it for a couple months with heavy usage from our 6 young children who love to draw. It hung easily and quickly with provided hardware. The tray slides back and forth so it can be easily moved off to the side if needed, or completely removed without needing to remove the board from the wall. When my home classroom is set up, I will be purchasing a couple more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Magnetic Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my Grandson, he wanted a place something to keep track of all the things he does. This will be perfect. the size is great and the magnets purchased to go with this will make it a fun place for him to keep track of homework, school activities and special dates and places. The board arrived prompt, was very well-packaged and protected from damage during S&H. Great buy and value. Would definitely purchase additional items from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sirelle

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built, easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a big dry erase board for his room and this fit the bill perfectly. It's solidly built and so far is holding up to his abuse. Best of all, it was easy to mount to the wall thanks to the design of the screwholes - there are holes you drill/screw through at each corner and then cover with little caps - much easier than trying to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: 48x36 looks good, very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 48x36 size. Pretty easy to install (installed by myself with not much upper body strength; just pushed it against the wall as I was leveling it and marking holes). The screws it came with are very long so I ended up getting shallower (1 inch) drywall anchors and cutting the four screws with bolt cutters. It's now pretty firmly on the wall, no worries here! Looks much better than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Robpol86

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Erases cleanly even after writing is left for two weeks. Light enough to carry to my Classical Conversations Challenge class. Fairly sturdy construction. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is indeed magnetic and easy to clean. It was heavy enough to be fairly sturdy but light enough that I was able to mount it to a door by using a number of Velcro removable hangers instead of putting multiple holes in the door. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keene_CA_lady

customer_reviews.title: Great white board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's playroom and it has worked out great so far. He loves putting his magnetic letters and other toys on it. We also draw on it and he loves erasing! The size is great, not too big or small. I like the rounded edges so I don't have to worry about him hurting himself on a sharp corner.
customer_reviews.author: Dan h.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but both items arrived damaged (bent aluminum rail)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality...especially for the price. I was at staples and they wanted $120 for the same size dry erase board and it wasn't even magnetic. However, I returned the first one because it arrived damaged (bent aluminum rails). Second one arrived and it was slightly bent on the top aluminum rail but it didn't affect functionality and you couldn't see the damage once it was hung. I am giving it 3 stars because it arrived damaged when I received them both. Still worth the price
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great to display my new prints
customer_reviews.text: Works great to display my new prints, which I need to see everyday for a time to confirm that I printed the image right
customer_reviews.author: eyeland

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as heck, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy as heck. Very magnetic (buy the magnetic erasers, you won't regret it!) Durable. What else can you say, when a product exceeds your expectations? I expect this whiteboard will be around for at least five years, maybe a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Berferd "Buford" Cheswick

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of the board and I decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the board and I decided to use it for magnetic clips and to write reminders. It was pretty easy to hang. But I give it five stars because the packaging was very poor. One of the sides of the cardboard box it came in, had a hole and therefore the board was damaged, the dent is right in the middle and it's about 4 inches long. I had to stick a magnetic calendar on the board to cover the dent, but because I hate returning a product and honestly i just don't have the time to deal with returns, i decided to keep it. I would strongly suggest to the seller to improve the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Superb Amazing the best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This board is awesome. Took just a few minutes to install. Light easy to erase, and helps me with all job related planning, certifications exams. Absolutely love this product. High Quality. Shipped lightning fast! Highly Recommend A++++
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy Nagorny

customer_reviews.title: but it looks good. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Arrived one day late, but it looks good. Sturdy. Easy installation. Secured to the wall from all 4 corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Voest

customer_reviews.title: 2nd try, but overall good quality white board, but slightly smaller, not full 48x36inches
customer_reviews.text: The first one came quickly and we were super excited, but had a huge dent in it. I used the "replacement" option to return first one and exchange for a new one. The first one is all ready and packaged to be returned to UPS. The 2nd one, which is the replacement arrived 2 days later so that was super quick. This one was perfect, no dents. The only why a deducted a star is because the whiteboard does not measure 48x36, it is 47x34 inches. I am okay with it still, it was a great deal and great quick prime delivery and stress-free replacement. We are excited to use our whiteboard at home.
customer_reviews.author: Dhpham

customer_reviews.title: Beware of damages during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The package was bent in the middle and the board and its frame were horribly bent, the writing surface was creased and unusable! Sent it back but now I would have to pay $17 extra to have a new one overnighted.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: THREE DENTS
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this as far as the dents go. There are three... I took pics. One on top of frame and TWO on the white part of the board. Honestly, bc I NEED this for my in-home business right away... I may just have to keep. However, if this were going to be placed in a board room or professional setting... I prob would return. I had actually read a review describing a similar rating bc of dents. My thoughts were it was just a fluke... poor person. But, now I'm beginning to wonder if these are second "scratch and dent" products. The board is nice and big and the frame does seem sturdy... but, those dents... sigh!
customer_reviews.author: kathlyn harbin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Homeschool Momma!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my second grader when school closed during COVID because it was just too hard to keep track of all the post-it notes! The board came packaged and bubble wrapped so there was no damage to it at all. It is very easy to clean and doesn't stain when you leave expo marker on it all week long. I use a microfiber cloth to remove any writing and it always stays nice and clean! I also used the hardware that came with to attach it to our wall in the kitchen. Great purchase and fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: MomBoss

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Sturdy Magnetic White Board
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very pleased with this white board. After two attempts (box was destroyed and board bent by carrier on 1st attempt), I finally got the board and it's perfect for my needs, being a larger size. The board itself is weighty and stable enough as long as you don't abuse it. I love that it's magnetic; the board is holding up my posters for coloring. All hardware to attach the tray and hang on the wall came included. You'll have to supply your own magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dry erase board that's also magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dry erase board that's also magnetic. Could have given 5 stars but since this is the only one I've ever had I don't have any others to compare to. Easy to hang with a screw in each corner. Would have been nice to also have a way to hang it on nails but I understand it wouldn't have been as stable.
customer_reviews.author: somuch

customer_reviews.title: Extremely flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It works, but came with a decent amount of cosmetic damage to the frame and I wasn't able to return it due to its large size. For a "new" item, it looked like it was used. Made out of soft, Chinese grade aluminum that will dent at the slightest hit with anything hard. Wouldn't recommend due to the risk of damage during shipping and overall low quality.
customer_reviews.author: SundownKid

customer_reviews.title: Nice product (but could be packed better!)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and just as described! A little bit better QC in the factory would be appreciated, as ours arrived with two noticeable dents in the board surface itself. No time to send it back, as we’re both public school teachers getting right to work on videoing remote instruction from home. The dents don’t make it unusable, but any damage right out of the box is always a little disappointing. Other than that, it mounted quickly and easily with two of us, the board surface was smooth and easy to erase, and it seems like it will fit the bill for a couple of teachers looking to replicate (in small form) a classroom setup for creating online instruction!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: The white board arrived damaged. It had a dent ...
customer_reviews.text: The white board arrived damaged. It had a dent in the metal frame, which was disappointing . I checked the shipping box, which did not show any signs of mishandling. In fact, the way that it was packed indicated that the item was damaged prior to being placed in the shipping box. Rather than going through the hassle of returning the product, I will simply keep it "as is," thus reflecting the negative review.
customer_reviews.author: Randy LeVan

customer_reviews.title: Playroom win!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my kids for their playroom. We wanted a board that was magnetic. They have used it well and have not scratched or broken it. I would have liked to see a larger tray for markers and eraser. I can't complain about the price though, less then Staples wanted. Its a perfect size for play and school projects, the pre-k teacher loves that the kids are writing with their hands in a neutral position and all their art and things stick with magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Second one I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. They work very well and a re a good size for an office. It comes well packaged and comes with a small shelf which can be attached or not depending on your preference. The shelf will hold a white board cleaning pad and about 4 markers, which you will need to purchase separately. Good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen North

customer_reviews.title: Large Size Is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to create a family calendar in our home. The size is perfect and the fact that its magnetic is even better! I can stick up important notes and what not. Very helpful when it comes to getting my family organized! Maybe the only thing I might change is making the marker holder ledge longer. It only covers about half the size in length. It would be perfect if it went all the way across.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Resourceful, Sleek = Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Getting a lot done with this addition to my office. I was concerned about what shape it would arrive in after reading reviews about the product being bent and dented. Fortunately I did not have that issue. Upon opening the package I noticed how they've taken precautions to ensure this product arrives in perfect shape, which means they've listened to feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Law of Literally Magic™

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty but sizing is a little loose.
customer_reviews.text: If you are getting these for games where exact size doesn't matter, they are fine. If you are concerned about size for fitment reasons then you may not be happy. I would have given 5 stars except for that. Of a small sample of 5 marbles that I measured out of the package, they ranged fro 13.7mm to 14.8mm. Decide for you self.
customer_reviews.author: Popper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Board is 47x35. Very easy to install and seems like good quality. One point is directions say put marker tray on last. To slide tray on the board needed to be a little off the wall so tighten the top screws and leave the bottom a little loose until you slide in the tray.
customer_reviews.author: kai0717

customer_reviews.title: A nice whiteboard, cleaned easily
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard serves my husband well. He got it a month nth ago and so far, it's cleaned easily and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Riv Laz

customer_reviews.title: Good whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived completely intact, so I either got lucky or they've improved their packaging since all the dented reviews were posted. It's a good whiteboard. It is smooth to write on and cleans off as expected. We'll see how it holds up long term, but I'm very happy with it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great board but banged up
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice, large, magnetic white board I got for my husband’s office. Unfortunately, in shipping two sides were damaged. He says he’ll live with it but I wish the trim pieces were perfect for $58. The board itself is slightly bent at one dent. Other than that, it’s excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Item looks good, but the first one that arrived was bent
customer_reviews.text: Item looks good, but the first one that arrived was bent. Tested with magnets and it will work well, so I'm returning and reordering. Ok, I moved my review to one start. Tried to reorder but the item is not available. Links changed to direct me to a smaller board. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased 5 of these
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought one of these because no local retailer had a whiteboard this large. Then discovered they are a great place to attach post-it notes for all sorts of tasks and projects. Got another one. Anyway, now I have five of these boards sitting on my desk and work tables. Great boards. All survived shipping and arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnet board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display all my travel magnets. Before I tried the magnetic paint, and that was a joke; it didn't hold anything that had any weight to it. This white board, holds ALL of them! Very happy. Once I fill this one, I will order another.
customer_reviews.author: The Senator

customer_reviews.title: Great board but came slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: This board is great but it had some dents in the white board. It was packaged very nicely so it must have happened before packaging. The damage is right above the letter i in the word girl. Not worth sending back for a new one. It’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Farida P. Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son to use during his college studies. He secured the board to the wall with command strips and it has held strong - making it easy to relocate with no wall damage! Surface cleans well with no traces of markers left behind. Excellent board.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and love that its magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my home office and it is amazing! I love that it is magnetic!! I was never a fan of the "cork" or wood style bulletin boards because of the pins and this is such a nice upgrade from that along with being a dry erase board. It's like 2 in 1! A bulletin board organizer and dry erase board you can write on.
customer_reviews.author: Erik T

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY whiteboard -- EASY to clean and worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Great white board -- easy to clean, HIGH QUALITY surface. The surface of the whiteboard makes a big difference when it comes to cleaning. SUPER easy. The cheap, LOW quality whiteboards leave "shadows" and are difficult to clean. You really do get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Came With Minor Damages
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews, the product itself was good but it came with some minor damages around the edge. Overall, the couple of dents weren't a big enough deal for me to return i, but this seems to be a pattern when looking through all of the reviews. With regards to the product itself, it's a smooth board that erases easily. The marker tray is easy to move around to any side of the board. And hanging it on the wall was fairly straight forward with screws and drywall anchors included in the shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Frame
customer_reviews.text: Overall the whiteboard seems fine. Unfortunately, the frame was damaged (see pics) which I discovered once I opened it. The shipping box was not damaged, so I’m led to believe that this was a quality control issue. I did not try to return it because it had already taken extra days than originally stated to deliver and I really needed it for classroom. I also did not want to deal with repacking and dragging to post office to return!
customer_reviews.author: aimlraz

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This seems like it will work fine, its very sturdy on the wall and seems to be pretty easy to clean. The packaging was okay and the board was damaged in several places so there are now indentations all over the writing surface. It will get the job done but it doesn't look like a new board, looks like its been through some trauma and frankly is a little bit ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Sarah U

customer_reviews.title: Hard to uninstall but decent whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Really nice whiteboard, wish the tray was larger for markers though. Can’t really fit more than one marker plus an easier. Uninstalling it was a bit barbaric as the acre caps are hard/impossible to get off. I just took the lever part of a hammer and pried it off the wall. If you’re not planning on staying where you are either leave the screw caps off for easier uninstallation or make sure you don’t sink the screws into a stud or the hammer trick won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: My board arrived damaged and without a marker tray!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the quality and price of this product are worth the purchase. Mine did arrive damaged and the advertised marker tray was not included. However, it is still usable and the issues are not significant enough to go through the hassle of a return. I would appreciate the marker tray though! This is a 5-star product that did not arrive as advertised, but I will still use it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, services it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. There was 2 pretty big dents on the frame. One in which prevents the little shelf to slide all the way down. However I bought this for a mechanic shop. A, they can probably bend it out, and B, It doesn't have to look perfect. Overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is the white board to get
customer_reviews.text: I use this magnetic board with small magnets to post the many different study pages that I use to practice guitar. The size allows multiple pages to be posted in sequence so that work is not interrupted by turning pages. The unit is of high quality, arrived quickly and was well packed so there was no degradation of the smooth and hard porcelain surface.
customer_reviews.author: pberguy

customer_reviews.title: Happy I Purchased!
customer_reviews.text: So, I was contemplating on buying this due to seeing there were quite a few people who mentioned receiving a damaged item. The board arrived on time and perfectly, without any defects. It’s the perfect size for me and for play for my 3 year old. Happy I got it!
customer_reviews.author: NeoshaLoves

customer_reviews.title: The BEST White board ;)
customer_reviews.text: Currently on our fifth whiteboard from Xboard, After four boards we are still very happy with the quality of these boards. Magnetized easy to Erase and still bright white after a crazy amount if use. Five stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, it arrived on time and was very well packaged. I hung it with some strong double sided tape instead of screwing it onto the wall. The board is magnetic so its great to have your magnetic eraser on there. The clear on the board is in great condition, doesnt leave any markings and erases well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BOARD!
customer_reviews.text: I received this board a day early. Super satisfied. I have it up in my room to note and hang documents. Very sturdy, I love the marker holder ledge it came with. I definitely recommend this product. My step-son loves to draw and is going to love it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Basqui

customer_reviews.title: Great tool at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Does what it says. Easy to install and adds a lot to my office. I have found myself writing notes on it and then taking pictures of the notes when I move on to a different project. This things helps me to visualize my thought on my current project. It's a great tool at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JerrodTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Mirrored back and hard to get markers off
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful size! mirror back. However, it’s really hard to get the dry erase markers off the whiteboard. I used the amazon basics markers and had to use expo wash to get the marks off
customer_reviews.author: Ella Noor

customer_reviews.title: As a dry erase board I am not sure what ...
customer_reviews.text: As a dry erase board I am not sure what more you could expect from it. you can write on it with dry erase markers and wipe them off over and over again. The tray to hold the markers is flimsy and doesn't really sit flat, so if that is important to you then look elsewhere, otherwise buy magnetic pens and the problem is mostly solved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The marker tray is also too short and pretty flimsy (including two of the trays would have helped)
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived with a large crease in the white board and a crease in the metal frame. The marker tray is also too short and pretty flimsy (including two of the trays would have helped). Would have given it 1 star but the board is white and it does have a metal backing so magnets do stick to it so not a total disaster.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Green

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised  Size Matters!
customer_reviews.text: The 48 X 36 is only 47 X 35 and that the outside of the frame. The whiteboard itself is 45 X 33. Otherwise seams good quality. Time will tell. It is heavy so that might be a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Reasons why it's great, from a college student
customer_reviews.text: Ok I swear this is an honest review from a student who does a lot of math. The packaging was really safe (lots of styrofoam and it has a plastic you can peel and the setup is really easy. The railing is great because it can be installed on the side or along the bottom. (When it's horizontal or in my case I put it up vertically so i put it on the "side"). It's easy to erase & the rail holds 4 Express markers when connected end to end. There is space though to squeeze them all in. Overall great product. Very worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Solid White Board (Magnetic)
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. This is magnetic board and worth the extra money to be able to attach items directly to the board. I use a combination of written and printed notes with my board
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived intact and exactly as described. The dry erase marker is easily wiped away with the eraser, leaving no residue or ghost lines. I am delighted with it and it serves my desired purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitty-Sniff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Very solid product. Good packaging. Comes covered in a plastic film, with bubble wrap and corner cardboard cushion. Came with 2 pencil-eraser-sized dings but they are in the back and out of sight. Tray slides on easily and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Meg B

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the product have nothing but great things to say about it I haven’t hung it because we had bought it for my son to use to do his homework and practice his writing so he mostly props it against the wall but it came in perfect condition and the tray was easy to slide on the bottom of the board also recommended to my mother who just bought one herself
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: easy to hang and so far maintains a white appearance ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a whiteboard for the office. This one was very reasonably priced. Arrived exactly as expected, easy to hang and so far maintains a white appearance after use. Would recommend buying from this seller and if I need another whiteboard I will be purchasing another one from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Poul

customer_reviews.title: Porcelain coating is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: The porcelain coating is infinitely better than the standard products. The ink never penetrates enough that you have to use a solvent to clean old writing. Highly recommend the additional cost for the Porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: No imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, no scratches or bends. It was really well packed so that might have helped. It attaches to the wall with four screws in the corners. After tightening them, there is no movement. So far, it's been easy to wipe. The marker holder is a bit short, but enough if you don't use too many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmin

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after reading the reviews since a lot said they received the board damaged but decided to go for it anyways. It arrived in perfect condition and is beautiful! So glad I took a chance on this! I also did not have any issues with peeling off the protective layer as other had. Mine came off smooth and did not get stuck under the frame. Highly recommend this board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed. Other reviews show damage upon shipping, but mine was perfect. Cleans easily even after marker left on for 2-5 days. So far... have used for 2 weeks and I like. Can’t beat the price. I put my notes on the board and place behind camera so it’s not installed on wall so I can’t speak to any sort of install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sized board but the quality upon arrival is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a large crease in the middle and several dents throughout despite the packaging appearing to be okay. This is a nice sized board but the quality upon arrival is not acceptable. Will be returning and looking for another.
customer_reviews.author: Petit Haricot Vert

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: My board came with a huge dent in the middle of the board. It tore the coating and is impossible to fix. Superbad construction and packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted. It came in without damage and being able to choose where to put the marker tray was a great bonus. Perfect in our space and our kids love to draw on it!
customer_reviews.author: lv2rdalot

customer_reviews.title: Metal brackets on outside are removable.
customer_reviews.text: I took off the outer metal pieces and screwed this into the wall. We use it as a photo board with magents we have collected from trips to different countries and cities. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this white board to write on, I bought it so that could use magnets to hold photographs I'm working on. I only print as large as 17x22 so this board is a perfect size; it can hold 2 such prints side-by-side or top-over-under. It installed very easily, without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Order
customer_reviews.text: I liked its duo ability and easy installation but I disliked the weak packaging that doesn’t protect the board from being slight bent which that’s what happened to my order.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha-Guardian

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the fact it is magnetic. I teach 6th grade and use it for small groups of 10 or less. The unit mounted very easily and is very sturdy. I'll let you at the end of the school year how it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Board to keep life organized!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very nice quality dry erase board. Have it in our barn to make sure everyone can communicate. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: addctd2plnts

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a big bend in the back of the rail around the board
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is OK, but it arrived with a large dent/bend in the back of the frame. Packaging doesn't seem to be adequate for individual shipping.
customer_reviews.author: The Athlete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Writing Board for My Online Teaching
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of this kind of writing board for my online teaching. The writing board is well-designed. I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Not anything exceptionally aesthetically pleasing, but good price and simple. Amazon Basics dry erase markers are not fully erasing on this surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board for my grandson !!!
customer_reviews.text: As you know, the original board was damaged when we received it. I notified AMAZON and, within one week, we had the replacement on our front porch !! Great magnet board with a LOT of space for my grandson to display his magnets, photos, etc. !!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Durrance

customer_reviews.title: A most have for office meetings and discussions
customer_reviews.text: We at my office use this board every week for our meetings. Have enough space to write numbers, dates, etc
customer_reviews.author: Juanita robiou

customer_reviews.title: Upset received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was upset to open up white board on Christmas morning for item to be damaged. Unable to mount on every side because of damage to board received.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: ... was damage to the frame during shipping due to poor packaging. I was initially willing to let this ...
customer_reviews.text: As noted by other reviewers there was damage to the frame during shipping due to poor packaging. I was initially willing to let this slide as it was fairly minor. However, when I tried to remove the protective film is stuck along all of the edges. The result is that there are bits of film sticking from all but one of the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and home school begins
customer_reviews.text: yeah.... starting home school and this is a must-have. Kids love it, doodling right after i installed it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleA@CHH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Board
customer_reviews.text: I am using the board as a inventory and tasking tool. It has helped with our organizational process. The ease of use, size and ease of cleaning are awesome. It arrived quickly and was easy to install. It is light enough that I used velcro tabs instead of the hardware provided. I would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. McGinley

customer_reviews.title: Very good board, great price and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good size board and easy to install. Came really well packed. Though it stays well on the wall, I wonder if the screws can be little bigger & longer might help!
customer_reviews.author: @Reyes

customer_reviews.title: really good.
customer_reviews.text: This is real board you can work professionally or with your kids. won't let you down. I can say this cuz I bought another one that little cheep but it was not firm board with many wrinkls on it. can you believe winkles on a broad? And they brave to enough to sell it. But this one? really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for home
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses to this to help my kids with their math lessons. It installed on the wall easily and the size is perfect for his use.
customer_reviews.author: C Toney

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on the wall and works well. Easy to clean and no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to install I did it myself in my home classroom
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Super easy to install just make sure you have a level or someone with a good eye. lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, tray the only issue.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, with a good mounting scheme using screws in each corner. The tray is metal with rubber on the edges and can be mounted anywhere along the bottom. It is wide enough for pens and an eraser. My only negative comment is that the tray fits somewhat loosely so it can easily slide along the bottom if bumped. So I had to come up with a way on my own to keep the tray where I wanted it and level.
customer_reviews.author: Neil F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect addition to my toddler son’s room. I had been searching for a white board that he could use with magnet letters and numbers. This board is the perfect size and weight to hang on his wall. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jelike

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Practical for kids to study at home during the lockdown and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Leila Tami

customer_reviews.title: Great product - watch the dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packed and in good condition - though I was worried! One caution - the size is not as expected. Purchased the 40x30 board - in the description it's also listed as being 31x40 and 39.5x31 When received, the actual measurement of the board is 31-5/8" x 39-1/2" I was really hoping for 31" tall maximum - the extra 5/8" means I can't mount it where it was intended. Otherwise - great product.
customer_reviews.author: B Engel

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to erase, unerasable lines
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new one of these, and even upon first use, erasing dry-erase lines is very difficult. It requires a lot of repeated scrubbing and elbow grease to even get anything off that has been left there for more than a few minutes. Once something has been there for a day, it is very likely to leave marks that cannot be removed by normal erasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike He

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY product and very easy to install (so do NOT pay for installation).
customer_reviews.author: LaToiya Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: This board is magnetic in addition to dry erase which is a useful feature. Wipes off easily and has a pen tray that you can place where you want. It's very easy to hang and move if you need to because it hangs on holes in the corners of the board vs. a hook on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hart

customer_reviews.title: Nice whiteboard for a small space. Consider keeping the markers in another location
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but the little tray for markers is so tiny. And loud..it doesn’t have a screw or anything to keep it from flapping around every time you use it. But the whiteboard itself is great, cleanly erases and all that good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cbecourt

product_meta.title: XBoard Magnetic Whiteboard 48 x 36, White Board 4 x 3, Dry Erase Board with Detachable Marker Tray
feature_bullets: Whiteboard exact outer size: 47. 3" x 35. 2". The magnetic dry erase board can be mounted vertically or horizontally with attached mounting hardware
The detachable marker tray can be placed on any of the whiteboard's 4 sides, to keep your writing materials close at hand
High grade sturdy aluminum frame built with ABS plastic corners, with no sharp or pointed edges.
Protective, anti-scratch magnetic dry erase surface also dual as a bulletin board by using magnets to pin notes, messages, pictures, memos, calendars and more
: Contact us for a free replacement if you have any issues with new arrivals!
